testcase.name: GeminiChat > sendMessage > should retain the initial user message when an automatic function call occurs
GeminiChat > sendMessage > should throw an error when attempting to add a user turn after another user turn
GeminiChat > sendMessage > should preserve text parts that are in the same response as a thought
GeminiChat > sendMessage > should add a placeholder model turn when a tool call is followed by an empty model response
GeminiChat > sendMessage > should call generateContent with the correct parameters
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream > should succeed if a tool call is followed by an empty part
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream > should fail if the stream ends with an empty part and has no finishReason
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream > should succeed if the stream ends with an invalid part but has a finishReason and contained a valid part
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream > should not consolidate text into a part that also contains a functionCall
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream > should consolidate subsequent text chunks after receiving an empty text chunk
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream > should consolidate adjacent text parts that arrive in separate stream chunks
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream > should preserve text parts that stream in the same chunk as a thought
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream > should add a placeholder model turn when a tool call is followed by an empty stream response
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream > should call generateContentStream with the correct parameters
GeminiChat > recordHistory > should consolidate all consecutive model turns into a single turn
GeminiChat > recordHistory > should add a placeholder model turn when a tool call is followed by an empty response
GeminiChat > recordHistory > should add user input and a single model output to history
GeminiChat > recordHistory > should consolidate adjacent text parts from multiple content objects
GeminiChat > recordHistory > should add an empty placeholder turn if modelOutput is empty
GeminiChat > recordHistory > should preserve model outputs with undefined or empty parts arrays
GeminiChat > recordHistory > should not consolidate content with different roles
GeminiChat > addHistory > should add a new content item to the history
GeminiChat > addHistory > should add multiple items correctly
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream with retries > should yield a RETRY event when an invalid stream is encountered
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream with retries > should retry on invalid content, succeed, and report metrics
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream with retries > should fall back to non-streaming when idle timeouts persist
GeminiChat > sendMessageStream with retries > should fail after all retries on persistent invalid content and report metrics
GeminiChat > should correctly retry and append to an existing history mid-conversation
GeminiChat > concurrency control > should queue a subsequent sendMessage call until the first one completes
GeminiChat > should retry if the model returns a completely empty stream (no chunks)
GeminiChat > should queue a subsequent sendMessageStream call until the first stream is fully consumed
GeminiChat > should discard valid partial content from a failed attempt upon retry
